dict.acceptation: （鸟）鸣；嗡嗡叫；呜呜作响；发嗖嗖声；
耳鸣；〈诗〉作诗；歌颂，赞美，称赞；唱着使…；
呜呜声，嗖嗖声；〈美口〉歌唱会；

sent.orig: The morphological relation between "sing" and "singer" and "song" is derivational.
sent.trans: 从形态关系上看，“sing”、“singer”和“song”都是由同一个词派生出来的。

sent.orig: Sing, sing together, merrily merrily sing.
sent.trans: 唱，大家一起唱，快乐地快乐地唱。

sent.orig: The bird that can sing and won't sing must be made to sing.
sent.trans: 生来能唱的鸟，不愿唱也得叫它唱。

sent.orig: Come and sing with John. Sing this happy song.
sent.trans: 来和约翰一起唱，唱这首欢快的歌。

sent.orig: Why not sing out the Scripture sing and remember His Word deeply in your heart.
sent.trans: 也许我们也可唱出神的话，用音乐来把衪的话深深的记在心里。
